title: Do Ayahuasca Healing Ceremonies really work?
description: Answer (1 of 5): I don't think you can bypass the real thing, my friend. I haven't tried ayahuaska or any other natural psychedelics but I have friends who did and they reported having traveled to other timelines. In my opinion, these methods cannot give you liberation.
